data.title: Umberto Nicola Tommaso Giovanni Maria (Savoia) di Savoia II (1904-1983)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Explore genealogy for Umberto (Savoia) di Savoia II born 1904 Castello di Racconigi, Piemonte, Kingdom of Italy died 1983 Geneva, Switzerland including ancestors + descendants + 5 photos + 1 genealogist comments + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
Ancestors Descendants

Profile last modified 19 Feb 2024 | Created 31 Mar 2015

This page has been accessed 2,685 times.

Biography

Preceded by

Victor Emmanuel III His Majesty

The King of Italy

9 May 1946 – 12 June 1946 Succeeded by

Defunct

Umberto (Savoia) di Savoia II is Notable.

King of Italy. Umberto, son of King Vittorio Emanuele III di Savoia and his consort Queen Elena di Montenegro, was born on 15 September 1904 at Castello di Racconigi in Piemonte, Kingdom of Italy.

Umberto wed Marie José of Belgium (1906–2001), daughter of King Albert I of Belgium, in Rome on 8 January 1930.

Umberto and Marie José had four children:

Maria Pia, born 1934;

Vittorio Emanuele, born 1937;

Maria Gabriella, born 1940;

Maria Beatrice, born 1943.

Umberto II was the last King of Italy, reigning for slightly over a month, from 9 May 1946 to 12 June 1946. He died on 18 March 1983 in Geneva, Switzerland.
